profile.title: Head of Department (HOD)
bio: The Head of Department of Pharmacy at Shivalik College brings extensive academic and research experience in pharmaceutical sciences. With a strong commitment to quality education and student development, the HOD leads the department in delivering excellence in pharmacy education.

Under the leadership of the HOD, the Department of Pharmacy has established itself as a premier institution for pharmaceutical education in Uttarakhand. The department focuses on comprehensive training in pharmaceutical sciences, combining theoretical knowledge with practical skills development.

The HOD's vision includes strengthening industry-academia partnerships, promoting research culture, and ensuring that graduates are well-prepared for diverse career opportunities in the pharmaceutical sector. The department actively participates in community health initiatives and pharmaceutical awareness programs.
